com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service

Class LockStatusServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service.LockStatusServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LockStatusService

    @Service
public class LockStatusServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LockStatusService
    The LockStatusServiceImpl is a class that implements defined by LockStatusService to implement business rules for locking mechanism for Ephesoft application features.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    LockStatusService

    • Method Detail

      • acquireLock

        @Transactional
public java.util.List<LockStatus> acquireLock(LockStatus lockStatus)
        Description copied from interface: LockStatusService
        Acquires the lock on the particular application feature if it is not being locked. This method returns list of all the features which are currently being locked by the user which is trying to acquire lock on the particular application feature.
        Specified by:
        acquireLock in interface LockStatusService
        Parameters:
        lockStatus - LockStatus The instance of the LockStatus.
        Returns:
        List <{@link LockStatus}> The list of all the features which are currently being locked by the user which is trying to acquire lock on the particular application feature.

public LockStatus getLockStatus(FeatureName featureName)

      • releaseAllLocks

        @Transactional
public void releaseAllLocks(java.lang.String userName)
        Description copied from interface: LockStatusService
        Releases all the locks from the application features which are being locked by the userName. This method returns list of all the features which are currently being locked by the userName.
        Specified by:
        releaseAllLocks in interface LockStatusService
        Parameters:
        userName - String The name of the user which has taken the lock on the application features.
